Interface Workplace

All Known Implementing Classes:
OfficeCentre
interface Workplace
Defines working hours for an organization. Implementing classes provide behavior to check whether the organization is open or closed at a given time

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final LocalTime
    closingHour
    Closing hour of the workplace(19:00)
    static final LocalTime
    openingHour
    Opening hour of the workplace (9:00)

    isWorking(LocalTime time)
    Determines if the place is open at the given time
